item.title: Jeff add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "The difference between sex and love is that sex relieves tension and love causes it." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Robert Orben
item.description: "Illegal aliens have always been a problem in the United States. Ask any Indian." -- Robert Orben

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power. If you realize that you have enough, you are truly rich." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Let no man pull you so low as to hate him." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Jeff add a quote by steve martin
item.description: "I believe that sex is one of the most beautiful, natural, wholesome things that money can buy." -- steve martin

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "My first time I jacked off, I thought I'd invented it. I looked down at my sloppy handful of junk and thought, This is going to make me rich." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Madonna
item.description: "Sick and perverted always appeals to me." -- Madonna

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Marquis de Sade
item.description: "Sexual pleasure is, I agree, a passion to which all others are subordinate but in which they all unite." -- Marquis de Sade

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Chastityâ€”the most unnatural of all the sexual perversions, he added parenthetically, out of [author:Remy de Gourmont|78190]." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Good sex is like good bridge. If you don't have a good partner, you'd better have a good hand." -- Mae West

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Tallulah Bankhead
item.description: "I'm as pure as the driven slush." -- Tallulah Bankhead

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Marquis de Sade
item.description: "What does one want when one is engaged in the sexual act? That everything around you give you its utter attention, think only of you, care only for you...every man wants to be a tyrant when he fornicates." -- Marquis de Sade

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "The legitimate powers of government extend to such acts only as are injurious to others. It does me no injury for my neighbor to say there are twenty gods or no god. It neither picks my pocket nor breaks my leg." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures. Simple in actions and thoughts, you return to the source of being. Patient with both friends and enemies, you accord with the way things are. Compassionate toward yourself, you reconcile all beings in the world." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Plato
item.description: "The price good men pay for indifference to public affairs is to be ruled by evil men." -- Plato

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Keith Richards
item.description: "If you're going to kick authority in the teeth, you might as well use two feet." -- Keith Richards

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Lao Tsu
item.description: "Those who know do not speak. Those who speak do not know." -- Lao Tsu

item.title: Jeff add a quote by John Milton
item.description: "The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.." -- John Milton

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Charles J. Sykes
item.description: "Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them. We all could." -- Charles J. Sykes

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams
